description: This is a scalar market on what the ETH floor price of CryptoPunks will be on September 21, 2021, at 12:00 PM ET. The lower bound for this market is 70 ETH and the upper bound is 135 ETH. The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on Larva Labs (https://www.larvalabs.com/cryptopunks/forsale#). Only listings that have existed for at least an hour are valid for this market (as verified by the transaction hash time). If no floor price is available at the resolution time, the source will be checked every following hour. You can use the calculator to the right (underneath the Buy modal) to calculate how each Long or Short Token price corresponds with the floor price. Long and Short shares will settle proportionally to the outcome value if the final value is between these bounds, but if the final value exceeds either the upper or lower bound, the price of each Outcome Token is capped at $1 and $0.
